alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 8:21PM CDT until June 29 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHERRY AND EAST CENTRAL SHERIDAN COUNTIES... At 721 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 17 miles southeast of Gordon to 29 miles southwest of Medicine Lake to 17 miles north of Ashby, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Highway 61 crossing the Snake River, Big Hill, Intersection of Highway 61 and Survey Valley Road, Morgan Lake and Billys Lake. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 173 and 208. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
